q: " The company also announced that starting April 4, Larry Page, Google Co-Founder, will take charge of company's day-to-day operations as CEO. Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman. I know he( Larry) will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly, Eric Schmidt said in Google blog post. "Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead," he continued. As Executive Chairman, Eric Schmidt said he will

staff Chicago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle is raising eyebrows over his recent comments about Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick , who has bounced back after being jailed for his role in a dogfighting ring in 2007. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game, and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle , an animal-rights activist, told MLB.com Wednesday for a story focusing on the work he and his wife do with animals. . Meanwhile, Lee's colleague, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand Gillbrand made a stop in Rochester Friday afternoon. She did not have much to say on Lee's actions, but rather on the voters in the district. My focus is on the constituents in teh district, and my goal is that they are all well looked after and have access to all the constituent services they need during this time of transition, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ,( D) New York. Kirsten Gillibrand did work closely with Lee to craft legislation for the families of Flight 3407 victims. She says that work will continue without the congressman. know what I was wearing," Conan O'Brien joked during an interview on the set of his new TBS talk show. The truth is David Letterman called him just to see how he was doing. I said, "We've always been good.' I have a lot of respect for that guy. And I said,` You didn't owe me a phone call, but I appreciate it.' And then he chatted about other silly things and that was it, Conan O'Brien says. "So it was not a lengthy phone call. He's not a blabbermouth. But it was nice." TBS- Conan O"Brien was touched by a phone call from David Letterman .

While protesters dismissed the Cabinet reshuffle as cosmetic and demanded Hosni Mubarak 's immediate ouster, Zahi Hawass said Egyptians should give his boss more time. The people in the streets have to give this government an opportunity to change, he said cheerfully. "Beautiful things happened in the last five days." This affects comments on all stories.
